item.title: How Bezos’ Phone Was Hacked
item.description: Good summary from the New York Times on How Bezos Phone Was Hacked, the article clearly states that the phone used by Bezos was an iphone X. I really like the end statement of the article because it is so true 😔 “It basically means that we are all extremely vulnerable” - Agnes Callamard
